verses.name: Isaiah 19:10
verses.text: And they shall be broken in the purposes thereof, all that make sluices and ponds for fish.

verses.name: Isaiah 19:11
verses.text: Surely the princes of Zoan are fools, the counsel of the wise counsellors of Pharaoh is become brutish: how say ye unto Pharaoh, I am the son of the wise, the son of ancient kings?

verses.name: Isaiah 19:12
verses.text: Where are they? where are thy wise men? and let them tell thee now, and let them know what the Lord of hosts hath purposed upon Egypt.
